Name: Blushing Mimosa
Instructions: POUR half the champagne into chilled glass, then orange juice, pineapple juice and the rest of the champagne. Finally pour pomegranate syrup/grenadine in to glass and allow to sink through cocktail.
Review: A mix of fruit juice and champagne with a sweet pomegranate syrup surprise in the bottom of the glass.
History: The sketchy history of both the Buck's Fizz and Mimosa can be found on our Buck's Fizz and Mimosa cocktail page .
Nutrition: One serving of Blushing Mimosa contains 131 calories
